snippet: Rumors that America was behind the failed military action threatened the safety of U.S. citizens in Turkey, Mr. Obama said, and could damage the nations’ ties....
abstract: Pres Obama denies United States had any role in failed military coup in Turkey, saying persistent rumors pose threat to safety of Americans there and relationship between countries; rumors have been fueled by fact that supposed architect Fethullah Gulen is living in Pennsylvania.
lead_paragraph: Rumors that America was behind the failed military action threatened the safety of U.S. citizens in Turkey, Mr. Obama said, and could damage the nations’ ties.

headline.main: Obama Denies U.S. Involvement in Coup Attempt in Turkey
headline.print_headline: Obama Denies U.S. Involvement in Coup Attempt in Turkey

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
